text: Selena Gomez is jealous of Camila Cabello and Taylor Swift ( Picture : Rex / Shutterstock ) Taylor Swift is gearing up to kick off her world tour in May, with Camila Cabello and Charli XCX in support. But, while fans are leaping up and down with excitement, one person reportedly isn ’ t too thrilled about the trio heading out on the road – Selena Gomez. According to reports, the Come And Get It singer is ‘ happy ’ for her fellow popstars, but is envious at the fun they are going to have without her. ‘ Selena is so happy for Camila and Taylor, she love them both and knows they ’ re going to have the best time on tour together, ’ an insider reportedly told HollywoodLife. ‘ But there ’ s a part of
